Articles.Content:
Modular KSRSS/SSRSS

 

What does this mod do? This mod splits up RSS / KSRSS and makes them stock size, for example: If you just want the Earth and Mun, you can! 

What planets do you plan on including? I plan on adding support for most RSS planets. Check the Road Map below for more information

Is this mod hard to run? Yes and no. Because of the textures it can be pretty ram intensive, but since it's only one body being highly edited you should have more fps than usual RSS or KSRSS.

Does it have clouds and scatterer support? Of course! Both are included.

Where are the clouds from? Here  Massive thank you to Adiri, Astronomer, Themaster401 and the KSRSS Team for helping me out.

Please read the README for licenses and other things: cfgs are CC-BY-NC-SA 4.0 while all textures are all rights reserved to the original owners provided in the README, thank you!

Spoiler

Thank you Blackrack, Sigma88, Galileo, pingopete, ItsJustLuci, Nhawks, The White Guardian, R-T-B, The KSRSS Team, HafCoJoe, Proot, Astronomer, Themaster401 and many more for making this possible. 

ROADMAP:

Spoiler

- 8k Texture Support/AVP

- Earth/moon System ☑

- Mars system☑

- Venus ☑

- Uranus and other gas planets.

- Adding more weather events

- Bug Support

Things may change based on real life activities but everything should be done soon.
